mutants.code:
def calculate_maximum_beauty(n: int, numbers: list[int]) -> int:
    numbers.sort(reverse=True)
    res = 1
    while numbers:
        res += sum(numbers)
        numbers = numbers[:len(numbers) // 4]
    return res

def calculate_maximum_beauty(n: int, numbers: list[int]) -> int:
    numbers.sort(reverse=True)
    res = -1
    while numbers:
        res += sum(numbers)
        numbers = numbers[:len(numbers) // 4]
    return res
